Summary: First of all, Donna is the besttttt, she accepted me and my girlfriend warmly and nicely even before we decided to stay there. Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, thoughtful touches and gorgeous beaches
Summary: I loved everything about this place! Lovely, accommodating staff, tasteful, spotless rooms and so many thoughtful touches — including beach chairs, umbrella and towels. The beaches — a short and truly beautiful walk across the PCH — are nothing short of spectacular, and the sunsets are out of this world. I grew up going to East Coast beaches and cannot get over the West Coast sunsets. Bonus: local seals frolicking on the beach, and gorgeous walking/running paths through the public park alongside the Mirage resort. I can’t wait to come back!
